data.title: Premium, popular and basic olive oils: mapping product segmentation and consumer profiles for different classes of olive oil
data.meta_description: Premium, popular and basic olive oils: mapping product segmentation and consumer profiles for different classes of olive oil - Author: Giuseppe Di Vita, Raffaele Zanchini, Giovanni Gulisano, Teresina Mancuso, Gaetano Chinnici, Mario D'Amico
